content: Feijão Tropeiro -  Ingredients: o 2 cups cooked beans, o 1/4 cup bacon, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/4 cup cassava flour, o 1/4 cup parsley, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic until crispy. o Add cooked beans and cassava flour, stir to combine. o Stir in chopped parsley and salt. o Serve warm.

title: Festival
content: Festival -  Ingredients: o 2 cups flour, o 1/4 cup cornmeal, o 1/4 cup sugar, o 1 tablespoon baking powder, o 1/2 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup milk, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Mix flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. o Add milk and stir until dough forms. o Roll out dough and cut into strips. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title: Focaccia
content: Focaccia -  Ingredients: o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast, o 1 teaspoon sugar, o 1 cup warm water, o 2 1/2 cups flour, o 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup olive oil, o Rosemary, o Sea salt,  Instructions: o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy. o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil. o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled. o Press dough into a baking pan, dimple with fingers, and sprinkle with rosemary and sea salt. o Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20-25 minutes until golden.

title: Freekeh Salad
content: Freekeh Salad -  Ingredients: o 1 cup freekeh, o 2 cups water, o 1 small onion, o 1/4 cup parsley, o 1/4 cup mint, o 1/4 cup lemon juice, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Rinse freekeh and cook in water until tender, then drain. o Sauté diced onion in olive oil until softened. o Mix freekeh with sautéed onion, chopped parsley, and mint. o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, and salt, then pour over salad. o Toss well and serve.

title: Fried Plantains
content: Fried Plantains -  Ingredients: o 2 ripe plantains, o 1 cup vegetable oil, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Peel and slice plantains. o Heat oil in a pan and fry plantain slices until golden. o Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt. o Serve warm.

title: Fried Rice
content: Fried Rice -  Ingredients: o 2 cups cooked rice, o 1 small onion, o 1/2 cup peas, 1/2 cup diced carrots, o 2 eggs, o 2 tablespoons soy sauce, o 1 tablespoon sesame oil, o 1/4 cup chopped green onions,  Instructions: o Sauté diced onion, peas, and carrots in sesame oil until softened. o Push vegetables to the side and scramble eggs in the same pan. o Add cooked rice and soy sauce, stir to combine. o Cook until heated through. o Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.

title: Fufu
content: Fufu -  Ingredients: o 2 cups cassava flour, o 4 cups water,  Instructions: o Bring water to a boil. o Gradually add cassava flour, stirring constantly until thickened. o Continue to cook, stirring, until smooth and elastic. o Serve warm.

title: Gamja Jorim
content: Gamja Jorim -  Ingredients: o 4 potatoes, o 1/4 cup soy sauce, o 2 tablespoons sugar, o 1 tablespoon sesame oil, o 1/4 cup water, o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds,  Instructions: o Peel and dice potatoes. o Sauté potatoes in sesame oil until lightly browned. o Add soy sauce, sugar, and water, simmer until potatoes are tender. o Garnish with sesame seeds and serve warm.

title: Garlic Bread
content: Garlic Bread -  Ingredients: o 1 baguette, o 1/2 cup butter, o 4 cloves garlic, o 1/4 cup parsley, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Slice baguette in half lengthwise. o Mix softened butter with minced garlic, chopped parsley, and salt. o Spread mixture on bread. o Bake for 10-15 minutes until golden. o Serve warm.

title: Gazpacho
content: Gazpacho -  Ingredients: o 4 tomatoes, o 1 cucumber, o 1 small red onion, o 1 bell pepper, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Dice tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and bell pepper. o Blend vegetables with minced garlic, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper until smooth. o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

title: Gigantes Plaki
content: Gigantes Plaki -  Ingredients: o 2 cups giant beans, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 4 tomatoes, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 teaspoon oregano, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Soak beans overnight, then cook until tender. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened. o Add diced tomatoes, oregano, salt, and pepper, simmer for 10 minutes. o Mix beans with tomato sauce and transfer to a baking dish. o Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes. o Serve warm.

title: Goi Cuon (Spring Rolls)
content: Goi Cuon (Spring Rolls) -  Ingredients: 1 package rice paper wrappers, o 1/2 pound shrimp, o 1/2 cup rice vermicelli, o 1/2 cup lettuce, o 1/4 cup mint, o 1/4 cup cilantro, o 1/4 cup basil, o 1/4 cup carrots, o 1/4 cup cucumber,  Instructions: o Cook shrimp and slice in half. o Cook rice vermicelli according to package instructions, then drain. o Soak rice paper wrappers in warm water until pliable. o Place a small amount of shrimp, vermicelli, lettuce, mint, cilantro, basil, julienned carrots, and cucumber on each wrapper. o Roll tightly and serve with dipping sauce.

title: Gomae (Spinach with Sesame Dressing)
content: Gomae (Spinach with Sesame Dressing) -  Ingredients: o 1 bunch spinach, o 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, o 1 tablespoon soy sauce, o 1 tablespoon sugar, o 1 tablespoon mirin,  Instructions: o Blanch spinach in boiling water, then rinse in cold water and squeeze out excess moisture. o Toast sesame seeds and grind them. o Mix sesame seeds with soy sauce, sugar, and mirin. o Toss spinach with dressing and serve.

title: Gratin Dauphinois
content: Gratin Dauphinois -  Ingredients: o 4 potatoes, o 1 cup heavy cream, o 1/2 cup milk, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/2 cup grated Gruyère cheese, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Peel and thinly slice potatoes. o Rub a baking dish with a cut clove of garlic. Layer potatoes in the dish, seasoning with salt and pepper. o Mix cream, milk, and minced garlic, pour over potatoes. o Sprinkle with grated Gruyère cheese. o Bake for 45 minutes until golden and bubbly. o Serve warm.

title: Greek Salad
content: Greek Salad -  Ingredients: o 4 tomatoes, o 1 cucumber, o 1 small red onion, o 1/4 cup olives, o 1/4 cup feta cheese, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, o 1 teaspoon oregano, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion. o Mix vegetables with olives and crumbled feta cheese. o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, and salt, then pour over salad. o Toss well and serve.

title: Green Bean Casserole
content: Green Bean Casserole -  Ingredients: o 4 cups green beans, o 1 can cream of mushroom soup, o 1/2 cup milk, o 1 cup fried onions, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). o Cook green beans until tender. o Mix soup, milk, salt, and pepper in a baking dish. o Add green beans and half of the fried onions, stir to combine. o Bake for 25 minutes. o Top with remaining fried onions and bake for an additional 5 minutes. o Serve warm.

title: Guacamole
content: Guacamole -  Ingredients: o 3 avocados, o 1 lime, 1 small onion, o 2 tomatoes, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro, o 1 teaspoon minced garlic,  Instructions: o Cut avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl. o Mash the avocados with a fork. o Add lime juice, diced onion, chopped tomatoes, salt, cilantro, and garlic. o Mix well and serve immediately.

title: Gurkensalat (Cucumber Salad)
content: Gurkensalat (Cucumber Salad) -  Ingredients: o 2 cucumbers, o 1/4 cup sour cream, o 2 tablespoons vinegar, o 1 tablespoon sugar, o 1 teaspoon dill, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Slice cucumbers thinly. o Mix sour cream, vinegar, sugar, dill, and salt in a bowl. o Toss cucumbers with the dressing. o Serve chilled.

title: Gyeran Jjim
content: Gyeran Jjim -  Ingredients: o 4 eggs, o 1 cup water, o 1/4 cup green onions, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon sesame oil,  Instructions: o Beat eggs with water, salt, and chopped green onions. o Pour mixture into a heatproof bowl. o Steam for 10-15 minutes until set. o Drizzle with sesame oil and serve warm.

title: Harira
content: Harira -  Ingredients: o 1 cup lentils, o 1/2 cup chickpeas, o 1 small onion

title: Horta
content: Horta -  Ingredients: o 1 pound dandelion greens, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1/4 cup lemon juice, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Boil dandelion greens until tender, then drain. o Toss greens with olive oil, lemon juice, and salt. o Serve warm or chilled.

title: Hot and Sour Soup
content: Hot and Sour Soup -  Ingredients: o 4 cups chicken broth, o 1/2 cup sliced mushrooms, o 1/4 cup bamboo shoots, o 1/4 cup tofu, o 2 tablespoons soy sauce, o 2 tablespoons rice vinegar, o 1 tablespoon cornstarch, o 1 teaspoon chili paste, o 1 egg, o 1/4 cup chopped green onions,  Instructions: o Bring chicken broth to a boil. o Add mushrooms, bamboo shoots, tofu, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and chili paste. o Mix cornstarch with water and add to the soup, stirring until thickened. o Beat egg and slowly pour into the soup, stirring constantly. o Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.

title: Hummus
content: Hummus -  Ingredients: o 1 can chickpeas, o 1/4 cup tahini, o 1/4 cup lemon juice, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Drain and rinse chickpeas. o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Japchae
content: Japchae -  Ingredients: o 8 ounces sweet potato noodles, o 1/2 pound beef, o 1 small onion, o 1 carrot, o 1 bell pepper, o 1 cup spinach, o 2 tablespoons soy sauce, o 1 tablespoon sesame oil, o 1 tablespoon sugar, o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds,  Instructions: o Cook noodles according to package instructions, then drain. o Sauté sliced beef, diced onion, julienned carrot, and bell pepper in sesame oil until cooked. o Add spinach and cook until wilted. o Mix noodles with soy sauce, sugar, and sesame seeds. o Combine with cooked beef and vegetables. o Serve warm.

title: Jerk Vegetables
content: Jerk Vegetables -  Ingredients: o 1 cup broccoli, o 1 cup bell peppers, o 1 cup zucchini, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 2 tablespoons jerk seasoning, 1/4 cup olive oil,  Instructions: o Toss vegetables with minced garlic, jerk seasoning, and olive oil. o Roast at 400°F (200°C) until tender. o Serve warm.

title: Johnny Cakes
content: Johnny Cakes -  Ingredients: o 2 cups flour, o 1/4 cup sugar, o 1 tablespoon baking powder, o 1/2 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup butter, o 1/2 cup milk, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. o Cut in cold butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. o Add milk and stir until dough forms. o Roll out dough and cut into circles. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title: Jollof Rice
content: Jollof Rice -  Ingredients: o 2 cups rice, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 4 tomatoes, o 1/4 cup tomato paste, o 1/4 cup vegetable oil, o 1 teaspoon thyme, o 1 teaspoon curry powder, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper, o 4 cups chicken broth,  Instructions: o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in vegetable oil until softened. o Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, thyme, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook for 5 minutes. o Stir in rice and cook for 2 minutes. o Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. o Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender. o Serve warm.

title: Kachumbari
content: Kachumbari -  Ingredients: o 4 tomatoes, o 1 small onion, o 1 cucumber, o 1/4 cup cilantro, o 1/4 cup lemon juice, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Dice tomatoes, onion, and cucumber. o Mix vegetables with chopped cilantro, lemon juice, and salt. o Serve chilled.

title: Käsespätzle (Cheese Noodles)
content: Käsespätzle (Cheese Noodles) -  Ingredients: o 2 cups flour, o 1/2 cup milk, o 3 eggs, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg, o 1/4 cup butter, o 1 cup grated cheese, o 1 small onion,  Instructions: o Mix flour, milk, beaten eggs, salt, and nutmeg to form a batter. o Press batter through a spaetzle maker or colander into boiling water. o Cook until spaetzle floats to the surface, then drain. o Sauté sliced onion in butter until golden. o Layer spaetzle and grated cheese in a baking dish, top with sautéed onion. o Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15 minutes until cheese is melted. o Serve warm.

title: Kartoffelsalat (Potato Salad)
content: Kartoffelsalat (Potato Salad) -  Ingredients: o 4 potatoes, o 1 small onion, o 1/4 cup bacon, o 1/4 cup vinegar, o 1/4 cup chicken broth, o 1 tablespoon mustard, o 1 teaspoon sugar, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper Instructions: o Boil potatoes until tender, then dice. o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside. o Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened. o Mix vinegar, chicken broth, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper in a bowl. o Combine potatoes, bacon, and onion with the dressing. o Serve warm or chilled.

title: Keftedes
content: Keftedes -  Ingredients: o 1/2 pound ground beef, o 1/2 pound ground pork, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs, o 1 egg, o 1 teaspoon oregano, o 1 teaspoon mint, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten egg, oregano, mint, salt, and pepper in a bowl. o Form mixture into meatballs. o Heat oil in a pan and fry meatballs until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title: Kibbeh
content: Kibbeh -  Ingredients: o 1 cup bulgur, o 1/2 pound ground beef, o 1 small onion, o 1/4 cup pine nuts, o 1 teaspoon cumin, o 1 teaspoon allspice, o 1 teaspoon salt, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Soak bulgur in water until tender, then drain. o Mix bulgur with ground beef, diced onion, pine nuts, cumin, allspice, and salt. o Form mixture into balls or patties. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve.

title: Kimchi
content: Kimchi -  Ingredients: o 1 napa cabbage, o 1/4 cup sea salt, o 1 tablespoon sugar, o 2 tablespoons fish sauce, o 2 tablespoons gochugaru (Korean chili powder), o 4 cloves garlic, o 1 inch ginger, o 4 green onions,  Instructions: o Cut cabbage into quarters and soak in salted water for 2 hours. o Rinse and drain cabbage. o Mix sugar, fish sauce, gochugaru, minced garlic, grated ginger, and chopped green onions in a bowl. o Rub mixture onto cabbage leaves. o Pack cabbage into a jar and let ferment at room temperature for 2-3 days. o Store in the refrigerator and serve as needed.

title: Kongnamul Muchim
content: Kongnamul Muchim -  Ingredients: o 1 pound soybean sprouts, o 2 cloves garlic, o 2 tablespoons soy sauce, o 1 tablespoon sesame oil, o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds,  Instructions: o Blanch soybean sprouts in boiling water for 2 minutes, then drain. o Mix minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, and sesame seeds in a bowl. o Toss sprouts with the dressing. o Serve chilled.

title: Labneh
content: Labneh -  Ingredients: o 2 cups yogurt, o 1/2 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup olive oil,  Instructions: o Mix yogurt with salt. o Place yogurt in a cheesecloth-lined strainer over a bowl. o Let drain in the refrigerator for 24 hours. o Transfer labneh to a serving dish and drizzle with olive oil. o Serve with pita bread.

title: Larb
content: Larb -  Ingredients: o 1/2 pound ground chicken, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 2 tablespoons fish sauce, o 2 tablespoons lime juice, o 1 tablespoon sugar, o 1 tablespoon rice powder, o 1/4 cup mint, o 1/4 cup cilantro, o 1-2 Thai chilies,  Instructions: o Sauté ground chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked. o Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, and rice powder in a bowl. o Toss chicken with the dressing, chopped mint, cilantro, and sliced chilies. o Serve with lettuce leaves.

title: Lo Mein
content: Lo Mein -  Ingredients: o 8 ounces lo mein noodles, o 1 cup sliced bell peppers, o 1 cup snow peas, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 2 tablespoons soy sauce, o 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, o 1 tablespoon sesame oil,  Instructions: o Cook lo mein noodles according to package instructions, then drain. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant. o Add bell peppers and snow peas, stir-fry until tender. o Add cooked noodles, soy sauce, and oyster sauce, stir to combine. o Serve warm.

title: Loubia
content: Loubia -  Ingredients: o 2 cups white beans, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 4 tomatoes, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon paprika, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup cilantro,  Instructions: o Soak beans overnight, then cook until tender. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened. o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minutes. o Mix beans with tomato sauce and cook for 10 minutes. o Stir in chopped cilantro and serve warm.

title: Macaroni and Cheese
content: Macaroni and Cheese -  Ingredients: o 2 cups elbow macaroni, o 2 cups milk, o 2 tablespoons butter, o 2 tablespoons flour, o 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Cook macaroni according to package instructions, then drain. o Melt butter in a saucepan, stir in flour to make a roux. o Gradually add milk, stirring constantly until thickened. o Add cheese, salt, and pepper, stir until melted. o Combine cheese sauce with macaroni. o Serve warm.

title: Manakish
content: Manakish -  Ingredients: o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast, o 1 teaspoon sugar, o 1 cup warm water, o 3 cups flour, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1/4 cup za'atar,  Instructions: o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy. o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil. o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled. o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles. o Spread za'atar mixed with olive oil on top. o Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 10-12 minutes until golden. o Serve warm.

title: Mandazi
content: Mandazi -  Ingredients: o 2 cups flour, o 1/4 cup sugar, o 1 tablespoon baking powder, o 1/2 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup coconut milk, o 1/4 cup water, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. o Add coconut milk and water, stir until dough forms. o Roll out dough and cut into triangles. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title: Mandu
content: Mandu -  Ingredients: o 1 package dumpling wrappers, o 1/2 pound ground pork, o 1/2 cup chopped cabbage, o 1/4 cup chopped green onions, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1 tablespoon soy sauce, o 1 teaspoon sesame oil, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and fold to seal. o Fry in hot oil until golden, then steam for 5 minutes. o Serve with dipping sauce.

title: Mango Sticky Rice
content: Mango Sticky Rice -  Ingredients: o 1 cup glutinous rice, o 1 cup coconut milk, o 1/4 cup sugar, o 1/4 teaspoon salt, o 2 mangoes,  Instructions: o Rinse rice and soak in water for 1 hour. o Steam rice until tender. o Heat coconut milk with sugar and salt until dissolved. Mix coconut milk with cooked rice and let sit for 10 minutes. o Serve rice with sliced mangoes.

title: Mapo Tofu
content: Mapo Tofu -  Ingredients: o 1 block tofu, o 1/2 pound ground pork, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1 tablespoon chili bean paste, o 2 tablespoons soy sauce, o 1 tablespoon rice wine, o 1 teaspoon sugar, o 1/4 cup chicken broth, o 1 tablespoon cornstarch, o 1/4 cup chopped green onions,  Instructions: o Cut tofu into cubes and set aside. o Sauté ground pork, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned. o Add chili bean paste, soy sauce, rice wine, and sugar, cook for 2 minutes. o Add chicken broth and tofu, simmer for 5 minutes. o Mix cornstarch with water and add to the pan, stirring until thickened. o Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.

title: Mashed Potatoes
content: Mashed Potatoes -  Ingredients: o 4 potatoes, o 1/2 cup milk, o 1/4 cup butter, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Peel and dice potatoes. o Boil potatoes until tender, then drain. o Mash potatoes with milk, butter, salt, and pepper. o Serve warm.

title: Minestrone
content: Minestrone -  Ingredients: o 1 onion, o 2 carrots, o 2 celery stalks, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1 zucchini, 1 can diced tomatoes, o 4 cups vegetable broth, o 1 can cannellini beans, o 1 cup pasta, o 1/4 cup basil, o 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese,  Instructions: o Sauté diced onion, carrots, celery, and minced garlic until softened. o Add diced zucchini, tomatoes, and broth. o Bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes. o Add beans and pasta, cook until pasta is tender. o Stir in chopped basil and serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

title: Miso Soup
content: Miso Soup -  Ingredients: o 4 cups dashi broth, o 1/4 cup miso paste, o 1/2 cup tofu, o 1/4 cup green onions, o 1/4 cup seaweed,  Instructions: o Heat dashi broth until warm. o Dissolve miso paste in a small amount of broth, then add to the pot. o Add diced tofu and seaweed. o Simmer for 5 minutes. o Garnish with sliced green onions and serve.

title: Moqueca de Banana
content: Moqueca de Banana -  Ingredients: o 4 bananas, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1 bell pepper, o 2 tomatoes, o 1 cup coconut milk, o 1/4 cup cilantro, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell pepper until softened. o Add diced tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes. o Stir in coconut milk, sliced bananas, salt, and pepper. o Simmer for 10 minutes. o Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve warm.

title: Msemen
content: Msemen -  Ingredients: o 2 cups flour, o 1 cup semolina, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 cup water, o 1/4 cup butter,  Instructions: o Mix flour, semolina, and salt in a bowl. o Add water and knead until smooth. o Divide dough into balls and roll out into thin circles. o Brush with melted butter and fold into squares. o Cook on a hot griddle until golden on both sides. o Serve warm.

title: Muhammara
content: Muhammara -  Ingredients: o 2 red bell peppers, o 1/2 cup walnuts, o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses, o 1 teaspoon cumin, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed. o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth. o Serve with pita bread.

title: Mutabal
content: Mutabal -  Ingredients: o 2 eggplants, o 1/4 cup tahini, o 1/4 cup lemon juice, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash. Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Naan
content: Naan -  Ingredients: o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast, o 1 teaspoon sugar, o 1/2 cup warm water, o 2 1/2 cups flour, o 1/2 cup yogurt, o 1/4 cup melted butter, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy. o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture, yogurt, and melted butter. o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled. o Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles. o Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side. o Brush with melted butter and serve warm.

title: Nom Du Du (Green Papaya Salad)
content: Nom Du Du (Green Papaya Salad) -  Ingredients: o 1 green papaya, o 2 carrots, o 1/4 cup peanuts, o 1/4 cup cilantro, o 2 tablespoons fish sauce, o 2 tablespoons lime juice, o 1 tablespoon sugar, o 1-2 Thai chilies,  Instructions: o Peel and shred green papaya and carrots. o Crush peanuts and chop cilantro. o Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, and sliced chilies in a bowl. o Toss shredded papaya, carrots, peanuts, and cilantro with the dressing. o Serve chilled.

title: Nuoc Cham
content: Nuoc Cham -  Ingredients: o 1/4 cup fish sauce, o 1/4 cup lime juice, o 2 tablespoons sugar, 2 cloves garlic, o 1-2 Thai chilies, o 1/4 cup water,  Instructions: o Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, minced garlic, and sliced chilies in a bowl. o Add water and stir until sugar is dissolved. o Serve as a dipping sauce.

title: Oi Muchim
content: Oi Muchim -  Ingredients: o 2 cucumbers, o 2 cloves garlic, o 2 tablespoons soy sauce, o 1 tablespoon sesame oil, o 1 tablespoon gochugaru (Korean chili powder), o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds,  Instructions: o Slice cucumbers thinly. o Mix minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, gochugaru, and sesame seeds in a bowl. o Toss cucumbers with the dressing. o Serve chilled.

title: Onigiri (Rice Balls)
content: Onigiri (Rice Balls) -  Ingredients: o 2 cups cooked sushi rice, o 1/4 cup filling (salmon, pickled plum), o 1 sheet nori (seaweed),  Instructions: o Wet hands and shape rice into balls or triangles. o Make a small indentation and add filling. o Wrap with a strip of nori. o Serve immediately.

title: Pão de Queijo
content: Pão de Queijo -  Ingredients: o 2 cups tapioca flour, o 1 cup milk, o 1/2 cup butter, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, o 2 eggs,  Instructions: o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Heat milk, butter, and salt in a saucepan until boiling. Remove from heat and stir in tapioca flour until smooth. o Let cool slightly, then mix in grated cheese and beaten eggs. o Form dough into balls and place on a baking sheet. o Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden. o Serve warm.

title: Pad See Ew
content: Pad See Ew -  Ingredients: o 8 ounces wide rice noodles, o 1/2 pound chicken breast, o 1 cup broccoli, o 2 eggs, o 2 tablespoons soy sauce, o 2 tablespoons oyster sauce, o 1 tablespoon sugar, o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil,  Instructions: o Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain. o Sauté sliced chicken in vegetable oil until cooked, then set aside. o Scramble eggs in the same pan. o Add noodles, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar, stir to combine. o Add broccoli and cooked chicken, stir-fry until heated through. o Serve warm.

title: Pad Thai
content: Pad Thai -  Ingredients: o 8 ounces rice noodles, o 1/2 pound shrimp, o 2 eggs, o 1 cup bean sprouts, o 1/4 cup peanuts, o 2 tablespoons fish sauce, o 2 tablespoons tamarind paste, o 1 tablespoon sugar, o 1 tablespoon lime juice, o 1/4 cup green onions,  Instructions: o Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain. o Sauté shrimp in a pan until cooked, then set aside.

title: Pajeon (Pancakes)
content: Pajeon (Pancakes) -  Ingredients: o 1 cup flour, o 1 cup water, o 1 egg, o 1/2 cup green onions, o 1/2 cup seafood (optional), o 1 tablespoon soy sauce, o 1 tablespoon sesame oil,  Instructions: o Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl. o Add chopped green onions and seafood (if using). o Heat sesame oil in a pan and pour in batter. o Cook until golden on both sides. o Serve with soy sauce for dipping.

title: Pan con Tomate
content: Pan con Tomate -  Ingredients: o 1 baguette, o 4 tomatoes, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Slice baguette and toast until golden. o Rub toasted bread with cut garlic cloves. o Grate tomatoes and spread on bread. o Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt. o Serve immediately.

title: Paneer Tikka
content: Paneer Tikka -  Ingredients: o 1 pound paneer, o 1/2 cup yogurt, o 1 tablespoon lemon juice, o 1 teaspoon cumin, o 1 teaspoon coriander, o 1 teaspoon garam masala, o 1 teaspoon turmeric, 1 teaspoon salt, o Skewers,  Instructions: o Cut paneer into cubes. o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, and salt in a bowl. o Add paneer cubes and marinate for at least 1 hour. o Thread paneer onto skewers. o Grill or broil until golden, turning occasionally. o Serve warm.

title: Panzanella
content: Panzanella -  Ingredients: o 4 cups cubed bread, o 4 tomatoes, o 1 cucumber, o 1 small red onion, o 1/4 cup basil, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Toast bread cubes until golden. o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion. o Mix bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and chopped basil. o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and salt, then pour over salad. o Toss well and serve.

title: Papadum
content: Papadum -  Ingredients: o 1 cup urad dal flour, o 1/4 cup water, o 1/2 teaspoon salt, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Mix urad dal flour, water, and salt to form a dough. o Roll dough into thin circles. o Fry in hot oil until crispy. o Drain on paper towels and serve.

title: Patatas Bravas
content: Patatas Bravas -  Ingredients: o 4 potatoes, o 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/2 cup tomato sauce, o 1 teaspoon paprika, o 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, o 1/2 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup mayonnaise,  Instructions: o Peel and dice potatoes. o Toss potatoes with olive oil and salt, then roast at 400°F (200°C) until crispy. o Mix tomato sauce, paprika, and cayenne pepper in a bowl. o Serve potatoes with tomato sauce and a dollop of mayonnaise.

title: Pepper Pot
content: Pepper Pot -  Ingredients: o 1 pound beef, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 4 cups beef broth, o 1 cup spinach, o 1 cup okra, o 1 teaspoon thyme, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Sauté diced beef, onion, and minced garlic until browned. o Add beef broth, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer for 1 hour. o Stir in spinach and okra, cook until tender. o Serve warm.

title: Peri-Peri Chicken
content: Peri-Peri Chicken -  Ingredients: o 1 pound chicken thighs, o 1/4 cup peri-peri sauce, o 2 tablespoons olive oil, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Marinate chicken in peri-peri sauce, olive oil, salt, and pepper for at least 1 hour. o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). o Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes until cooked through. o Serve warm.

title: Pico de Gallo
content: Pico de Gallo -  Ingredients: 4 tomatoes, o 1 small onion, o 1 jalapeño, o 1/4 cup cilantro, o 1 lime, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Dice tomatoes, onion, and jalapeño. o Chop cilantro. o Combine all ingredients in a bowl. o Squeeze lime juice over the mixture and add salt. o Mix well and serve.

title: Pimientos de Padrón
content: Pimientos de Padrón -  Ingredients: o 1 pound Padrón peppers, o 2 tablespoons olive oil, o 1 teaspoon sea salt,  Instructions: o Heat olive oil in a pan. o Add Padrón peppers and sauté until blistered and tender. o Sprinkle with sea salt and serve warm.

title: Plantain Chips
content: Plantain Chips -  Ingredients: o 2 green plantains, o 1 cup vegetable oil, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Peel and slice plantains thinly. o Heat oil in a pan and fry plantain slices until crispy. o Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt. o Serve warm.

title: Polenta
content: Polenta -  Ingredients: o 1 cup cornmeal, o 4 cups water, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 2 tablespoons butter, o 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese,  Instructions: o Bring water and salt to a boil. o Gradually whisk in cornmeal. o Reduce heat and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened (about 30 minutes). Stir in butter and Parmesan cheese. o Serve warm.

title: Potato Salad
content: Potato Salad -  Ingredients: o 4 potatoes, o 2 eggs, o 1 small onion, o 1/2 cup mayonnaise, o 2 tablespoons mustard, o 1 tablespoon vinegar, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Boil potatoes until tender, then dice. o Hard-boil eggs, then chop. o Mix potatoes, eggs, diced onion, mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper. o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

title: Pretzels
content: Pretzels -  Ingredients: o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast, o 1 teaspoon sugar, o 1 cup warm water, o 3 cups flour, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup baking soda, o 1 egg, o Coarse salt,  Instructions: o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy. o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture. o Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled. o Divide dough into pieces and roll into ropes, then shape into pretzels. o Boil water with baking soda and dip pretzels in the solution. o Place on a baking sheet, brush with beaten egg, and sprinkle with coarse salt. o Bake at 450°F (230°C) for 12-15 minutes until golden. o Serve warm.

title: Pulao
content: Pulao -  Ingredients: o 1 cup basmati rice, o 2 cups water, o 1 small onion, 1 carrot, o 1/2 cup peas, o 1 teaspoon cumin, o 1 teaspoon coriander, o 1 teaspoon turmeric, o 1 teaspoon garam masala, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 2 tablespoons oil,  Instructions: o Rinse rice and soak in water for 30 minutes. o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion until translucent. o Add diced carrot, peas, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute. o Drain rice and add to the pan, stir to coat with spices. o Add water and bring to a boil. o Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water is absorbed. o Add salt to taste and serve.

title: Quesadillas
content: Quesadillas -  Ingredients: o 4 flour tortillas, o 2 cups shredded cheese, o 1/2 cup diced cooked chicken (optional), o 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil,  Instructions: o Heat oil in a pan. o Place a tortilla in the pan and sprinkle with cheese, chicken, and cilantro. o Top with another tortilla. o Cook until cheese is melted and tortilla is golden, then flip and cook the other side. o Cut into wedges and serve.

title: Quiche Lorraine
content: Quiche Lorraine -  Ingredients: o 1 pie crust, o 6 slices bacon, o 1 small onion, o 1 cup grated Gruyère cheese, o 3 eggs, o 1 cup heavy cream, o 1/2 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Cook bacon until crispy, then crumble. o Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened. o Place pie crust in a pie dish and sprinkle with bacon, onion, and cheese. o Beat eggs with cream, salt, and pepper, then pour over the filling. o Bake for 30-35 minutes until set and golden. o Serve warm.

title: Quindim
content: Quindim -  Ingredients: o 2 cups sugar, o 1 cup coconut, o 1/4 cup butter, o 10 egg yolks, o 1 teaspoon vanilla extract,  Instructions: o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). o Mix sugar, coconut, melted butter, egg yolks, and vanilla extract in a bowl. o Pour mixture into greased muffin tins. o Bake for 30-35 minutes until set and golden. o Let cool before removing from tins. o Serve chilled.

title: Raita
content: Raita -  Ingredients: o 1 cup yogurt, o 1/2 cucumber, o 1/4 cup mint, o 1/4 teaspoon cumin, o 1/4 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Grate cucumber and squeeze out excess moisture. o Mix yogurt with cucumber, chopped mint, cumin, and salt. o Serve chilled.

title: Ratatouille
content: Ratatouille -  Ingredients: o 1 eggplant, o 1 zucchini, o 1 bell pepper, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 4 tomatoes, o 1 teaspoon thyme, 1 teaspoon rosemary, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Dice eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, and tomatoes. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened. o Add eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, tomatoes, thyme, rosemary, and salt. o Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. o Serve warm.

title: Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir-Fried Morning Glory with Garlic)
content: Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir-Fried Morning Glory with Garlic) -  Ingredients: o 1 pound morning glory, o 4 cloves garlic, o 2 tablespoons fish sauce, o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil,  Instructions: o Sauté minced garlic in vegetable oil until fragrant. o Add morning glory and stir-fry until tender. o Add fish sauce and cook for 2 minutes. o Serve warm.

title: Refried Beans
content: Refried Beans -  Ingredients: o 2 cups cooked pinto beans, o 1/4 cup lard or vegetable oil, o 1 small onion, o 1 clove garlic, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Heat lard or oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent. o Add beans and mash with a potato masher. o Cook, stirring frequently, until beans are thickened. o Add salt to taste and serve.

title: Rfissa
content: Rfissa -  Ingredients: o 1 pound chicken, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1 teaspoon cumin, o 1 teaspoon turmeric, o 1 teaspoon ginger, 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 4 cups chicken broth, o 1/4 cup lentils, o 1/4 cup cilantro, o 4 pieces flatbread,  Instructions: o Sauté chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic in olive oil until browned. o Add cumin, turmeric, ginger, and salt, cook for 1 minute. o Add chicken broth and lentils, simmer until chicken is cooked and lentils are tender. o Stir in chopped cilantro. o Tear flatbread into pieces and place in a serving dish. o Pour chicken and sauce over the bread and serve warm.

title: Rice and Peas
content: Rice and Peas -  Ingredients: o 1 cup rice, o 1 cup coconut milk, o 1 cup water, o 1/2 cup kidney beans, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1 teaspoon thyme, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened. o Add rice, coconut milk, water, kidney beans, thyme, and salt. o Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender. o Serve warm.

title: Rillettes
content: Rillettes -  Ingredients: o 1 pound pork shoulder, o 1/2 cup duck fat, o 1/4 cup white wine, o 1 teaspoon thyme, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Cut pork into small pieces. o Cook pork with duck fat, wine, thyme, salt, and pepper in a pot over low heat until very tender (about 3 hours). o Shred pork with a fork and pack into jars. Chill until set. o Serve with bread.

title: Risotto
content: Risotto -  Ingredients: o 1 cup Arborio rice, o 4 cups chicken broth, o 1/2 cup white wine, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, o 2 tablespoons butter, o 1 tablespoon olive oil,  Instructions: o Heat broth in a pot and keep warm. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until translucent. o Add rice and cook until lightly toasted. o Pour in wine and cook until absorbed. o Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed. o Continue until rice is creamy and tender. o Stir in butter and grated Parmesan cheese. o Serve immediately.

title: Rösti (Potato Pancakes)
content: Rösti (Potato Pancakes) -  Ingredients: o 4 potatoes, o 1 small onion, o 1/4 cup flour, o 1 egg, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Grate potatoes and onion, then squeeze out excess moisture. o Mix with flour, beaten egg, salt, and pepper. o Form mixture into patties. o Fry in hot oil until golden on both sides. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title: Rotkohl (Braised Red Cabbage)
content: Rotkohl (Braised Red Cabbage) -  Ingredients: o 1 head red cabbage, o 1 small onion, o 1 apple, 1/4 cup vinegar, o 1/4 cup sugar, o 1/4 cup water, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Shred cabbage and slice onion and apple. o Sauté onion in a pot until softened. o Add cabbage, apple, vinegar, sugar, water, salt, and pepper. o Simmer for 45 minutes until cabbage is tender. o Serve warm.

title: Saganaki
content: Saganaki -  Ingredients: o 1/2 pound kefalotyri cheese, o 1/4 cup flour, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1 lemon,  Instructions: o Cut cheese into slices. o Dredge cheese in flour. o Heat olive oil in a pan and fry cheese until golden on both sides. o Squeeze lemon juice over the top and serve immediately.

title: Salade Niçoise
content: Salade Niçoise -  Ingredients: o 4 tomatoes, o 1 cucumber, o 1 small red onion, o 1/4 cup olives, o 1/4 cup green beans, o 2 hard-boiled eggs, o 1 can tuna, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, o 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion. o Blanch green beans until tender. o Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, onion, green beans, olives, and tuna on a plate. o Quarter hard-boiled eggs and add to the salad. o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and salt, then drizzle over the salad. o Toss gently and serve.

title: Salpicão
content: Salpicão -  Ingredients: o 2 cups shredded chicken, o 1 small onion, o 1 carrot, o 1 apple, o 1/4 cup raisins, o 1/4 cup mayonnaise, o 1/4 cup parsley, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Dice onion, grate carrot, and chop apple. o Mix shredded chicken with onion, carrot, apple, raisins, mayonnaise, chopped parsley, and salt. o Serve chilled.

title: Saltfish Fritters
content: Saltfish Fritters -  Ingredients: o 1 pound salted cod, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1/2 cup flour, o 1/4 cup water, o 1 teaspoon thyme, o 1 teaspoon salt, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Soak salted cod in water overnight, then rinse and flake. o Mix cod with diced onion, minced garlic, flour, water, thyme, and salt. o Form mixture into fritters. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

title: Samosa
content: Samosa -  Ingredients: o 2 cups flour, o 1/4 cup oil, o 1/2 cup water, o 2 potatoes, o 1/2 cup peas, o 1 small onion, o 1 teaspoon cumin, o 1 teaspoon coriander, 1 teaspoon garam masala, o 1 teaspoon salt, o Oil for frying,  Instructions: o Mix flour, oil, and water to form a dough, then let rest. o Boil and mash potatoes, then mix with peas, diced onion, and spices. o Roll dough into circles, cut in half, and form cones. o Fill cones with potato mixture and seal edges. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Serve warm.

title: Satay
content: Satay -  Ingredients: o 1 pound chicken breast, o 1/4 cup coconut milk, o 2 tablespoons soy sauce, o 2 tablespoons peanut butter, o 1 tablespoon curry powder, o 1 tablespoon brown sugar, o Skewers,  Instructions: o Cut chicken into strips and thread onto skewers. o Mix coconut milk, soy sauce, peanut butter, curry powder, and brown sugar in a bowl. o Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 1 hour. o Grill or broil until cooked through. o Serve with peanut sauce.

title: Sauerkraut
content: Sauerkraut -  Ingredients: o 1 head cabbage, o 1 tablespoon sea salt, o 1 teaspoon caraway seeds,  Instructions: o Shred cabbage and mix with sea salt and caraway seeds. o Pack cabbage into a jar and press down to release juices. o Cover and let ferment at room temperature for 1-2 weeks. o Store in the refrigerator and serve as needed.

title: Shakshuka
content: Shakshuka -  Ingredients: o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1 bell pepper, 4 tomatoes, o 1 teaspoon cumin, o 1 teaspoon paprika, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 4 eggs, o 1/4 cup parsley,  Instructions: o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and diced bell pepper until softened. o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minutes. o Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well. o Cover and cook until eggs are set. o Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.

title: Shawarma
content: Shawarma -  Ingredients: o 1 pound chicken thighs, o 1/4 cup yogurt, o 2 tablespoons lemon juice, o 2 cloves garlic, o 1 teaspoon cumin, o 1 teaspoon paprika, o 1 teaspoon turmeric, o 1 teaspoon salt, o 1/2 teaspoon pepper,  Instructions: o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, cumin, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper in a bowl. o Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 2 hours. o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). o Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes until cooked through. o Slice and serve with pita bread and toppings.

title: Skordalia
content: Skordalia -  Ingredients: o 4 potatoes, o 4 cloves garlic, o 1/4 cup olive oil, o 1/4 cup lemon juice, o 1 teaspoon salt,  Instructions: o Boil potatoes until tender, then mash. o Blend mashed potatoes with minced garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, and salt until smooth. Serve as a dip or side dish.

title: Som Tum (Green Papaya Salad)
content: Som Tum (Green Papaya Salad) -  Ingredients: o 1 green papaya, o 2 tomatoes, o 1 carrot, o 2 cloves garlic, o 2 tablespoons fish sauce, o 2 tablespoons lime juice, o 1 tablespoon sugar, o 1 tablespoon peanuts, o 1-2 Thai chilies,  Instructions: o Peel and shred green papaya and carrot. o Crush garlic and chilies in a mortar and pestle. o Add fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar, mix well. o Toss shredded papaya, carrot, and sliced tomatoes with the dressing. o Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve.

title: Sopa de Tortilla
content: Sopa de Tortilla -  Ingredients: o 4 corn tortillas, o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, o 1 small onion, o 2 cloves garlic, o 4 cups chicken broth, o 2 tomatoes, o 1 teaspoon cumin, o 1 avocado, o 1/4 cup cilantro,  Instructions: o Cut tortillas into strips and fry in oil until crispy. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in a pot until translucent. o Add diced tomatoes and cumin, cook for 5 minutes. o Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. o Simmer for 10 minutes. o Serve soup topped with tortilla strips, diced avocado, and chopped cilantro.

title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
content: Chicken Caesar Wrap - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat tortilla, •, 1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced, •, 1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped, •, 2 tablespoons Caesar dressing, •, 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, •, Optional: croutons for extra crunch Instructions: • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly. • Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Quinoa Salad
content: Quinoa Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cooked quinoa, •, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/2 cucumber, diced, •, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a large bowl, combine the quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Turkey and Avocado Sandwich
content: Turkey and Avocado Sandwich - Ingredients: •, 2 slices whole grain bread, •, 4 slices turkey breast, •, 1/2 avocado, sliced, •, 1/2 cup spinach leaves, •, 1 tablespoon mustard or mayo Instructions: • Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread. • Layer the turkey, avocado, and spinach on top. • Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
content: Greek Yogurt Parfait - Ingredients: •, 1 cup Greek yogurt, •, 1/2 cup granola, •, 1/2 cup mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries), •, 1 tablespoon honey Instructions: • In a bowl or jar, layer the Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries. • Drizzle with honey. • Repeat the layers if desired.

title: Hummus and Veggie Pita
content: Hummus and Veggie Pita - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat pita bread, •, 1/2 cup hummus, •, 1/2 cup cucumber, sliced, •, 1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced, •, 1/4 cup shredded carrots, •, 1/4 cup baby spinach Instructions: • Cut the pita bread in half to create pockets. • Spread hummus inside each pocket. • Fill with cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, and spinach.

title: Tuna Salad
content: Tuna Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 can tuna, drained, •, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, •, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, •, 1 celery stalk, diced, •, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, Salt and pepper to taste, •, Lettuce leaves or whole grain bread for serving Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the tuna, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, celery, and red onion. • Season with salt and pepper. Serve on lettuce leaves or whole grain bread.

title: Caprese Sandwich
content: Caprese Sandwich - Ingredients: •, 2 slices ciabatta bread, •, 1/2 cup fresh mozzarella, sliced, •, 1 tomato, sliced, •, Fresh basil leaves, •, 1 tablespoon balsamic glaze, •, 1 tablespoon olive oil, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Drizzle olive oil on one slice of bread. • Layer the mozzarella, tomato, and basil on top. • Drizzle with balsamic glaze and season with salt and pepper. • Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title: Chicken Salad Lettuce Wraps
content: Chicken Salad Lettuce Wraps - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cooked chicken breast, shredded, •, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, •, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, •, 1 celery stalk, diced, •, 1/4 cup red grapes, halved, •, Salt and pepper to taste, •, Lettuce leaves for serving Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the chicken, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, celery, and grapes. • Season with salt and pepper. • Serve in lettuce leaves.

title: Veggie and Hummus Wrap
content: Veggie and Hummus Wrap - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat tortilla, •, 1/2 cup hummus, •, 1/2 cup cucumber, sliced, •, 1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced, 1/4 cup shredded carrots, •, 1/4 cup baby spinach Instructions: • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the hummus evenly. • Add the cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, and spinach. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Egg Salad Sandwich
content: Egg Salad Sandwich - Ingredients: •, 4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped, •, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, •, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, •, 1 celery stalk, diced, •, Salt and pepper to taste, •, 2 slices whole grain bread Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the eggs, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, and celery. • Season with salt and pepper. • Spread on one slice of bread and top with the second slice.

title: Pasta Salad
content: Pasta Salad - Ingredients: •, 2 cups cooked pasta (such as rotini or penne), •, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/2 cup cucumber, diced, •, 1/4 cup black olives, sliced, •, 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a large bowl, combine the pasta, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and feta cheese. • Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Chicken and Avocado Salad
content: Chicken and Avocado Salad - Ingredients: 1 cup cooked chicken breast, diced, •, 1/2 avocado, diced, •, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the chicken, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Turkey and Cheese Roll-Ups
content: Turkey and Cheese Roll-Ups - Ingredients: •, 4 slices turkey breast, •, 4 slices cheese (such as cheddar or Swiss), •, 1/2 cup baby spinach, •, 1/4 cup hummus Instructions: • Lay a slice of turkey flat and spread with hummus. • Place a slice of cheese and a few spinach leaves on top. • Roll up tightly and repeat with remaining ingredients.

title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
content: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed, •, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/2 cucumber, diced, •, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: •, In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry
content: Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced, •, 1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced, •, 1/2 cup broccoli florets, •, 1/4 cup snap peas, •, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, •, 1 tablespoon olive oil, •, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, •, Cooked rice for serving Instructions: • In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. • Add bell pepper, broccoli, and snap peas, and stir-fry until tender. • Add the cooked chicken and soy sauce, and stir to combine. • Drizzle with sesame oil and serve over rice.

title: Shrimp and Avocado Salad
content: Shrimp and Avocado Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined, •, 1/2 avocado, diced, •, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the shrimp, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Black Bean and Corn Salad
content: Black Bean and Corn Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed, •, 1 cup corn kernels (fresh or canned), •, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 1/4 cup cilantro, chopped, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lime juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a large bowl, combine the black beans, corn, tomatoes, red onion, and cilantro. • Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Chicken and Pesto Sandwich
content: Chicken and Pesto Sandwich - Ingredients: •, 2 slices whole grain bread, •, 1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced, •, 2 tablespoons pesto, •, 1/2 cup baby spinach, •, 1/4 cup roasted red peppers, sliced Instructions: • Spread pesto on one slice of bread. • Layer the chicken, spinach, and roasted red peppers on top. • Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title: Lentil Salad
content: Lentil Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cooked lentils, •, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/2 cucumber, diced, •, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a large bowl, combine the lentils, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. • Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Chickpea and Avocado Sandwich
content: Chickpea and Avocado Sandwich - Ingredients: •, 2 slices whole grain bread, •, 1/2 avocado, mashed, •, 1/2 cup chickpeas, mashed, •, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1 tablespoon olive oil, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the mashed avocado and chickpeas. • Spread the mixture on one slice of bread. • Top with cherry tomatoes and drizzle with olive oil. • Season with salt and pepper, then top with the second slice of bread.

title: Greek Salad
content: Greek Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/2 cucumber, diced, •, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 1/4 cup black olives, sliced, •, 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a large bowl, combine the tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese. • Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Turkey and Cranberry Wrap
content: Turkey and Cranberry Wrap - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat tortilla, •, 4 slices turkey breast, •, 2 tablespoons cranberry sauce, •, 1/2 cup baby spinach, •, 1/4 cup shredded carrots Instructions: Lay the tortilla flat and spread the cranberry sauce evenly. • Add the turkey, spinach, and carrots. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Caprese Salad
content: Caprese Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/2 cup fresh mozzarella, diced, •, Fresh basil leaves, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon balsamic glaze, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil. • Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Chicken and Veggie Skewers
content: Chicken and Veggie Skewers - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cooked chicken breast, cubed, •, 1/2 cup bell pepper, cubed, •, 1/2 cup zucchini, sliced, •, 1/4 cup red onion, cubed, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Thread the chicken, bell pepper, zucchini, and red onion onto skewers. • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper. • Serve cold or reheat before serving.

title: Tuna and Avocado Salad
content: Tuna and Avocado Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 can tuna, drained, •, 1/2 avocado, diced, •, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the tuna, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Veggie Sushi Rolls
content: Veggie Sushi Rolls - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cooked sushi rice, •, 1/2 cucumber, julienned, •, 1/2 avocado, sliced, •, 1/4 cup carrot, julienned, •, 2 sheets nori (seaweed), •, Soy sauce for dipping Instructions: • Lay a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat. • Spread a thin layer of sushi rice over the nori, leaving a 1-inch border at the top. • Arrange the cucumber, avocado, and carrot in a line along the bottom edge of the rice. • Roll the nori tightly using the bamboo mat. • Slice into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce. Spinach and Feta Stuﬀed Pita Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat pita bread, •, 1/2 cup spinach, chopped, •, 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled, •, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1 tablespoon olive oil, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Cut the pita bread in half to create pockets. • In a bowl, combine the spinach, feta cheese, and cherry tomatoes. • Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. • Stuﬀ the mixture into the pita pockets.

title: BBQ Chicken Wrap
content: BBQ Chicken Wrap - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat tortilla, •, 1 cup cooked chicken breast, shredded, •, 2 tablespoons BBQ sauce, •, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, •, 1/4 cup coleslaw mix Instructions: • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the BBQ sauce evenly. • Add the chicken, cheese, and coleslaw mix. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Couscous Salad
content: Couscous Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cooked couscous, •, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/2 cucumber, diced, •, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: •, In a large bowl, combine the couscous, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Eggplant and Hummus Sandwich
content: Eggplant and Hummus Sandwich - Ingredients: •, 2 slices whole grain bread, •, 1/2 cup roasted eggplant slices, •, 1/4 cup hummus, •, 1/4 cup baby spinach, •, 1/4 cup roasted red peppers, sliced Instructions: Spread hummus on one slice of bread. • Layer the roasted eggplant, spinach, and roasted red peppers on top. • Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title: Chicken and Mango Salad
content: Chicken and Mango Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cooked chicken breast, diced, •, 1/2 mango, diced, •, 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped, •, 1/4 cup cilantro, chopped, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lime juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the chicken, mango, red onion, and cilantro. • Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Veggie and Cheese Quesadilla
content: Veggie and Cheese Quesadilla - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat tortilla, •, 1/2 cup shredded cheese, •, 1/4 cup bell pepper, sliced, •, 1/4 cup zucchini, sliced, •, 1/4 cup red onion, sliced Instructions: • Lay the tortilla flat and sprinkle half of the cheese on one side. • Add the bell pepper, zucchini, and red onion. • Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and fold the tortilla in half. •, Cook in a skillet over medium heat until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is golden brown. • Slice into wedges.

title: Chickpea and Spinach Wrap
content: Chickpea and Spinach Wrap - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat tortilla, •, 1/2 cup chickpeas, mashed, 1/4 cup spinach, chopped, •, 1/4 cup shredded carrots, •, 1 tablespoon tahini, •, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the mashed chickpeas, spinach, carrots, tahini, and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper. • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the mixture evenly. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Turkey and Apple Sandwich
content: Turkey and Apple Sandwich - Ingredients: •, 2 slices whole grain bread, •, 4 slices turkey breast, •, 1/2 apple, thinly sliced, •, 1/4 cup baby spinach, •, 1 tablespoon mustard or mayo Instructions: • Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread. • Layer the turkey, apple slices, and spinach on top. • Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.

title: Mediterranean Tuna Salad
content: Mediterranean Tuna Salad - Ingredients: •, 1 can tuna, drained, •, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/4 cup cucumber, diced, •, 1/4 cup black olives, sliced, •, 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled, •, 2 tablespoons olive oil, •, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the tuna, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and feta cheese. • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Chicken and Avocado Wrap
content: Chicken and Avocado Wrap - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat tortilla, •, 1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced, •, 1/2 avocado, sliced, •, 1/4 cup baby spinach, •, 1 tablespoon ranch dressing Instructions: • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the ranch dressing evenly. • Add the chicken, avocado, and spinach. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Lentil and Veggie Wrap
content: Lentil and Veggie Wrap - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat tortilla, •, 1/2 cup cooked lentils, •, 1/4 cup bell pepper, sliced, •, 1/4 cup cucumber, diced, •, 1/4 cup shredded carrots, •, 1 tablespoon hummus Instructions: • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the hummus evenly. • Add the lentils, bell pepper, cucumber, and carrots. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Turkey and Hummus Wrap
content: Turkey and Hummus Wrap - Ingredients: •, 1 whole wheat tortilla, •, 4 slices turkey breast, •, 1/4 cup hummus, •, 1/4 cup shredded carrots, •, 1/4 cup baby spinach Instructions: • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the hummus evenly. • Add the turkey, carrots, and spinach. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

title: Pancakes
content: Pancakes - Ingredients: •, 1 cup all-purpose flour, •, 2 tablespoons sugar, •, 1 teaspoon baking powder, •, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, •, 1/4 teaspoon salt, •, 1 cup buttermilk, •, 1 large egg, •, 2 tablespoons melted butter, •, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract Instructions: • In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. • In another bowl, combine buttermilk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract. • Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. • Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it. • Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake. • Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown. • Serve with syrup and your favorite toppings.

title: Scrambled Eggs
content: Scrambled Eggs - Ingredients: •, 4 large eggs, •, 1/4 cup milk, •, Salt and pepper to taste, •, 1 tablespoon butter Instructions: • In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. • Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and melt the butter. • Pour the egg mixture into the skillet. • Cook, stirring gently, until the eggs are set but still soft. • Serve immediately.

title: French Toast
content: French Toast - Ingredients: •, 4 slices of bread, •, 2 large eggs, •, 1/2 cup milk, •, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, •, 1 tablespoon butter Instructions: • In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon. • Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides. • Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and melt the butter. • Cook the bread slices until golden brown on both sides. • Serve with syrup and powdered sugar.

title: Smoothie Bowl
content: Smoothie Bowl - Ingredients: •, 1 banana, •, 1/2 cup frozen berries, •, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, •, 1/4 cup milk, •, Toppings: granola, fresh fruit, nuts, seeds Instructions: • In a blender, combine banana, frozen berries, Greek yogurt, and milk. • Blend until smooth. • Pour into a bowl and top with granola, fresh fruit, nuts, and seeds.

title: Avocado Toast
content: Avocado Toast - Ingredients: •, 2 slices of bread, •, 1 ripe avocado, •, Salt and pepper to taste, •, Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, red pepper flakes, poached egg Instructions: • Toast the bread slices. • Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt and pepper. • Spread the mashed avocado on the toast. • Add optional toppings if desired.

title: Breakfast Burrito
content: Breakfast Burrito - Ingredients: •, 2 large eggs, •, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon, •, 1/4 cup diced bell pepper, •, 1/4 cup diced onion, •, 1 large flour tortilla, •, Salsa for serving Instructions: • In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cook them in a skillet over medium heat. • Add cheese, sausage or bacon, bell pepper, and onion to the eggs. • Cook until the eggs are set and the vegetables are tender. • Place the egg mixture in the center of the tortilla and roll it up. • Serve with salsa.

title: Oatmeal
content: Oatmeal - Ingredients: •, 1 cup rolled oats, •, 2 cups water or milk, •, 1/4 teaspoon salt, •, Toppings: fresh fruit, nuts, honey, cinnamon Instructions: • In a saucepan, bring water or milk to a boil. • Add oats and salt, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. • Remove from heat and let sit for a few minutes. • Serve with your favorite toppings.

title: Yogurt Parfait
content: Yogurt Parfait - Ingredients: •, 1 cup Greek yogurt, •, 1/2 cup granola, •, 1/2 cup fresh berries, •, Honey for drizzling Instructions: • In a glass or bowl, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and fresh berries. • Drizzle with honey. • Repeat layers if desired.

title: Breakfast Sandwich
content: Breakfast Sandwich - Ingredients: •, 1 English muﬃn, split and toasted, •, 1 large egg, •, 1 slice of cheese, •, 1 slice of ham or bacon, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Cook the egg in a skillet over medium heat, seasoning with salt and pepper. • Place the cheese on top of the egg to melt. •, Assemble the sandwich with the egg, cheese, and ham or bacon between the English muﬃn halves.

title: Chia Pudding
content: Chia Pudding - Ingredients: •, 1/4 cup chia seeds, •, 1 cup almond milk, •, 1 tablespoon honey or maple syrup, •, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, •, Toppings: fresh fruit, nuts, coconut flakes Instructions: •, In a bowl, whisk together chia seeds, almond milk, honey or maple syrup, and vanilla extract. • Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight. • Stir well before serving and top with your favorite toppings.

title: Breakfast Quesadilla
content: Breakfast Quesadilla - Ingredients: •, 1 large flour tortilla, •, 2 large eggs, •, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, •, 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon, •, 1/4 cup diced bell pepper, •, Salsa for serving Instructions: • In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cook them in a skillet over medium heat. • Add cheese, sausage or bacon, and bell pepper to the eggs. • Cook until the eggs are set and the vegetables are tender. • Place the egg mixture on one half of the tortilla and fold the other half over. Cook in the skillet until the tortilla is golden brown and crispy. • Serve with salsa.

title: Banana Bread
content: Banana Bread - Ingredients: •, 3 ripe bananas, mashed, •, 1/3 cup melted butter, •, 1/2 cup sugar, •, 1 large egg, beaten, •, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, •, 1 teaspoon baking soda, •, Pinch of salt, •, 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour Instructions: • Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). • In a bowl, mix mashed bananas and melted butter. • Add sugar, beaten egg, and vanilla extract, and mix well. • Stir in baking soda, salt, and flour until just combined. • Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan. • Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. • Let cool before slicing.

title: Breakfast Tacos
content: Breakfast Tacos - Ingredients: •, 2 large eggs, •, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, •, 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon, •, 1/4 cup diced bell pepper, •, 1/4 cup diced onions, •, 2 small flour tortillas, •, Salsa for serving Instructions: • In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cook them in a skillet over medium heat. • Add cheese, sausage or bacon, onions and bell pepper to the eggs. • Cook until the eggs are set and the vegetables are tender. • Divide the egg mixture between the tortillas. • Serve with salsa.

title: Granola Bars
content: Granola Bars - Ingredients: •, 2 cups rolled oats, •, 1/2 cup honey or maple syrup, •, 1/2 cup peanut butter, •, 1/2 cup chopped nuts, •, 1/2 cup dried fruit, •, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract Instructions: • Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). •, In a bowl, mix oats, honey or maple syrup, peanut butter, nuts, dried fruit, and vanilla extract. • Press the mixture into a greased baking dish. • Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. • Let cool before cutting into bars.

title: Smoothie
content: Smoothie - Ingredients: •, 1 banana, •, 1/2 cup frozen berries, •, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, •, 1/2 cup milk, •, 1 tablespoon honey Instructions: • In a blender, combine banana, frozen berries, Greek yogurt, milk, and honey. • Blend until smooth. • Serve immediately.

title: Breakfast Pizza
content: Breakfast Pizza - Ingredients: •, 1 pre-made pizza crust, •, 1/2 cup marinara sauce, •, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, •, 2 large eggs, •, 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon, •, 1/4 cup diced bell pepper Instructions: • Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). • Spread marinara sauce over the pizza crust. • Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top. • Crack the eggs onto the pizza. • Add sausage or bacon and bell pepper. • Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the eggs are set and the cheese is melted. • Serve immediately. Muﬃns Ingredients: •, 2 cups all-purpose flour, •, 1/2 cup sugar, •, 1 tablespoon baking powder, •, 1/2 teaspoon salt, •, 1 cup milk, •, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, •, 1 large egg, •, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, •, 1 cup fresh or frozen berries Instructions: • Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). • In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. • In another bowl, combine milk, vegetable oil, egg, and vanilla extract. • Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. • Fold in the berries. • Divide the batter evenly among a greased muﬃn tin. • Bake for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. • Let cool before serving.

title: Breakfast Casserole
content: Breakfast Casserole - Ingredients: •, 6 large eggs, •, 1 cup milk, •, 1 cup shredded cheese, •, 1/2 cup cooked sausage or bacon, •, 1/2 cup diced bell pepper, •, 1/2 cup diced onion, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). • In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. • Stir in cheese, sausage or bacon, bell pepper, and onion. • Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish. • Bake for 30-35 minutes or until the eggs are set. • Let cool slightly before serving.

title: Bagel with Cream Cheese
content: Bagel with Cream Cheese - Ingredients: •, 1 bagel, sliced and toasted, •, 2 tablespoons cream cheese, •, Optional toppings: smoked salmon, capers, red onion, tomato slices Instructions: • Spread cream cheese on each half of the toasted bagel. • Add optional toppings if desired. • Serve immediately.

title: Breakfast Skillet
content: Breakfast Skillet - Ingredients: •, 2 large eggs, •, 1/2 cup diced potatoes, •, 1/4 cup diced bell pepper, •, 1/4 cup diced onion, •, 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon, •, Salt and pepper to taste, •, 1 tablespoon olive oil Instructions: • Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. • Add potatoes, bell pepper, and onion, and cook until tender. • Add sausage or bacon and cook until heated through. • Make two wells in the mixture and crack an egg into each well. • Cover and cook until the eggs are set. • Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

title: Breakfast Bowl
content: Breakfast Bowl - Ingredients: •, 1/2 cup cooked quinoa, •, 1/4 cup black beans, rinsed and drained, •, 1/4 cup diced avocado, •, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1 large egg, poached or fried, •, Salt and pepper to taste, •, 1 tablespoon olive oil Instructions: • In a bowl, combine quinoa, black beans, avocado, and cherry tomatoes. • Top with the poached or fried egg. • Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. • Serve immediately.

title: Breakfast Croissant
content: Breakfast Croissant - Ingredients: •, 1 croissant, sliced in half, •, 1 large egg, •, 1 slice of cheese, •, 1 slice of ham or bacon, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Cook the egg in a skillet over medium heat, seasoning with salt and pepper. • Place the cheese on top of the egg to melt. •, Assemble the sandwich with the egg, cheese, and ham or bacon between the croissant halves. • Serve immediately.

title: Breakfast Frittata
content: Breakfast Frittata - Ingredients: •, 6 large eggs, •, 1/4 cup milk, •, 1/2 cup shredded cheese, •, 1/4 cup diced bell pepper, 1/4 cup diced onion, •, 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon, •, Salt and pepper to taste, •, 1 tablespoon olive oil Instructions: • Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). • In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. • Stir in cheese, bell pepper, onion, and sausage or bacon. • Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. • Pour the egg mixture into the skillet and cook until the edges are set. • Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until the eggs are set. • Let cool slightly before slicing and serving.

title: Breakfast Bagel Sandwich
content: Breakfast Bagel Sandwich - Ingredients: •, 1 bagel, sliced and toasted, •, 1 large egg, •, 1 slice of cheese, •, 1 slice of ham or bacon, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Cook the egg in a skillet over medium heat, seasoning with salt and pepper. • Place the cheese on top of the egg to melt. •, Assemble the sandwich with the egg, cheese, and ham or bacon between the bagel halves. • Serve immediately.

title: Overnight Oats
content: Overnight Oats - Ingredients: •, 1/2 cup rolled oats, •, 1/2 cup almond milk, •, 1 tablespoon chia seeds, •, 1 tablespoon honey or maple syrup, •, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, •, Toppings: fresh fruit, nuts, seeds Instructions: •, In a jar, combine oats, almond milk, chia seeds, honey or maple syrup, and vanilla extract. • Stir well, cover, and refrigerate overnight. In the morning, stir again and add your favorite toppings. Egg Muﬃns Ingredients: •, 6 large eggs, •, 1/4 cup milk, •, 1/2 cup diced bell pepper, •, 1/2 cup diced spinach, •, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). • In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. • Stir in bell pepper, spinach, and cheese. • Pour the mixture into a greased muﬃn tin. • Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the eggs are set. • Let cool before removing from the tin.

title: Apple Peanut Butter Sandwiches
content: Apple Peanut Butter Sandwiches - Ingredients: •, 1 apple, cored and sliced into rings, •, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, •, Optional toppings: granola, raisins, coconut flakes Instructions: • Spread peanut butter on one side of each apple ring. • Add optional toppings if desired. • Sandwich two apple rings together with the peanut butter sides facing in.

title: Protein Smoothie
content: Protein Smoothie - Ingredients: •, 1 banana, •, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, •, 1/2 cup almond milk, •, 1 scoop protein powder, •, 1 tablespoon peanut butter Instructions: In a blender, combine banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, protein powder, and peanut butter. • Blend until smooth. • Serve immediately.

title: Cottage Cheese and Fruit
content: Cottage Cheese and Fruit - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cottage cheese, •, 1/2 cup fresh berries, •, 1 tablespoon honey Instructions: • In a bowl, combine cottage cheese and fresh berries. • Drizzle with honey. • Serve immediately.

title: Veggie Wrap
content: Veggie Wrap - Ingredients: •, 1 large whole wheat tortilla, •, 1/4 cup hummus, •, 1/4 cup shredded carrots, •, 1/4 cup sliced cucumber, •, 1/4 cup baby spinach, •, 1/4 cup sliced bell pepper Instructions: • Spread hummus on the tortilla. • Layer with shredded carrots, cucumber, spinach, and bell pepper. • Roll up the tortilla tightly. • Slice in half and serve.

title: Almond Butter Banana Toast
content: Almond Butter Banana Toast - Ingredients: •, 2 slices whole grain bread, toasted, •, 2 tablespoons almond butter, •, 1 banana, sliced, •, 1 teaspoon chia seeds Instructions: • Spread almond butter on the toasted bread. Top with banana slices and sprinkle with chia seeds. • Serve immediately.

title: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Nuts
content: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Nuts - Ingredients: •, 1 cup Greek yogurt, •, 1 tablespoon honey, •, 1/4 cup mixed nuts Instructions: • In a bowl, combine Greek yogurt and honey. • Top with mixed nuts. • Serve immediately.

title: Avocado and Egg Toast
content: Avocado and Egg Toast - Ingredients: •, 2 slices whole grain bread, toasted, •, 1 ripe avocado, •, 1 large egg, poached or fried, •, Crushed red pepper flakes to taste, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Mash the avocado and spread it on the toasted bread. • Top with the poached or fried egg. • Season with crushed red pepper flakes + salt and pepper. • Serve immediately.

title: Quinoa Breakfast Bowl
content: Quinoa Breakfast Bowl - Ingredients: •, 1/2 cup cooked quinoa, •, 1/4 cup diced avocado, •, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1 large egg, poached or fried, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, avocado, and cherry tomatoes. • Top with the poached or fried egg. • Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

title: Berry and Spinach Smoothie
content: Berry and Spinach Smoothie - Ingredients: •, 1/2 cup frozen berries, •, 1/2 cup spinach, •, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, •, 1/2 cup almond milk, •, 1 tablespoon honey Instructions: • In a blender, combine frozen berries, spinach, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and honey. • Blend until smooth. • Serve immediately.

title: Fruit and Nut Bars
content: Fruit and Nut Bars - Ingredients: •, 1 cup dates, pitted, •, 1 cup mixed nuts, •, 1/4 cup dried fruit, •, 1 tablespoon honey Instructions: • In a food processor, combine dates, mixed nuts, dried fruit, and honey. • Process until the mixture comes together. • Press the mixture into a greased baking dish. • Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before cutting into bars. • Store in an airtight container.

title: Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie
content: Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie - Ingredients: •, 1 banana, •, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, •, 1/2 cup almond milk, •, 1 tablespoon peanut butter, •, 1 tablespoon honey Instructions: • In a blender, combine banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, peanut butter, and honey. • Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

title: Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl
content: Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl - Ingredients: •, 1 cup cottage cheese, •, 1/4 cup diced cucumber, •, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, •, 1/4 cup diced bell pepper, •, Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper. • Season with salt and pepper. • Serve immediately.

title: Almond Butter and Apple Slices
content: Almond Butter and Apple Slices - Ingredients: •, 1 apple, sliced, •, 2 tablespoons almond butter Instructions: • Spread almond butter on each apple slice. • Serve immediately.
